settings.title: SETTINGS
settings.resetMessage: This will erase all local progress and settings on this device.
settings.resetConfirmMessage: This will delete your game progress and restart from level 1. Do you want to continue?

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.acceptedMessage: You have accepted the Terms and Conditions. You may now use the app.
terms.content:
Welcome to Bake and Match.

Bake and Match is a memory and logic-based puzzle game designed to challenge concentration, recall, and problem-solving skills. The game includes time-based challenges and increasing difficulty levels.

The game does not provide hints, clues, or in-game solutions. Some levels may feel challenging or mentally demanding. Players are free to stop playing at any time if they feel discomfort or stress.

Bake and Match is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not claim to improve mental health or cognitive abilities.

Players may choose to use external resources to understand puzzle logic. This is entirely optional.

You agree not to exploit bugs, misuse the application, or attempt to copy or reverse-engineer the game logic.

The developer is not responsible for stress, frustration, fatigue, or loss of progress caused by gameplay or device issues.

By accepting these terms, you confirm that you understand the nature of the game and agree to all conditions stated above.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Bake and Match respects your privacy.

The app does not collect personal information such as name, email, phone number, or location.

Local data such as game progress and settings (language, sound, font size) may be stored on your device to improve gameplay experience.

Bake and Match does not share user data with third parties and does not use advertisements or analytics tools at this stage.

The app is suitable for general audiences, and no personal data is knowingly collected from children.

By using this app, you consent to this Privacy Policy.

homeMain.title: Home
homeMain.welcomeText: This is not a rush game. No hearts, no pressure, no countdown screaming at you. Just you, food, and a little curiosity. Take your time ‚Äî cooking is not a race.
homeMain.gameIdeaText: Bake & Match is a food-fusion memory game. Today it‚Äôs ingredients, tomorrow it could be street food, cultural dishes, or full recipes with real steps. This kitchen grows with you.
homeMain.level1: Personal Level: Start simple. Match ingredients, understand combinations, and get comfortable with the basics.
homeMain.level2: Baking Level: Things get warmer here. Follow longer steps, remember sequences, and build dishes layer by layer.
homeMain.level3: Memory Level: No recipes in front of you. Just memory, logic, and instinct ‚Äî like real cooking.
homeMain.tipsText: There are no lives to lose and no hints to buy. If you‚Äôre stuck, think, retry, or even Google it ‚Äî real cooks do. This is a mobile game made to relax your brain, not break your heart.
